channel.title: Ashikal on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in Ashikal on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Alisa Shirkalina
item.description: Alisa is a mechanical engineering student at the University of Waterloo. She is working with the Quantum Simulation team during the winter 2022 term, focusing on mechanical and optical design. Alisa also enjoys rock climbing, skiing, and hiking.
